text: Rabbi Yitzchok Tuvia Weiss (26 August 1926 – 29 July 2022)BDE: HaGaon HaRav Tuvia Weiss, Z’TL, Gaavad Of The Eidah HaChareidis was the Chief Rabbi, or Gaavad (Gaon Av Beis Din), of Jerusalem for the Edah HaChareidis from 2004 until his death. Rabbi Weiss was a British national. Weiss died on 29 July 2022 in Israel at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Naturalised citizens of the United Kingdom Category:Israeli rabbis Category:British Jews
title: Yitzchok Tuvia Weiss
